content: @PsalmistCrypt This is the kind of upgrade Bitcoin needed. BitVM turns BTC from passive store of value to programmable powerhouse.
@0x_vant @union_build Exactly. It effectively makes Bitcoin's massive economic security programmable for the first time. That's the fundamental unlock that enables all these new utility loops.
